definitions.definition: The digit or figure 4; an occurrence thereof.
Anything measuring four units, as length.
definitions.example: Do you have any more fours? I want to make this a little taller.

definitions.definition: A person who is four years old.
definitions.example: I'll take the threes, fours and fives and go to the playground.

definitions.definition: An event in which the batsmen run four times between the wickets or, more often, a batsman hits a ball which bounces on the ground before passing over a boundary, resulting in an award of 4 runs for the batting team. If the ball does not bounce before passing over the boundary, a six is awarded instead.
Four-man sweep racing shell, with or without a coxswain.
A numerical value equal to 4; the number after three and before five; two plus two. This many dots (••••)
definitions.example: There are four seasons: winter, spring, summer and autumn.

definitions.definition: Describing a set or group with four elements.
